column4: lately, i have been noticing that my X11 is terminated and I am left out in the console and whenever i press CTRL + F7 to go back to X, my ubuntu box just freezes up and i have to do a hard restart (pressing the button) because nothing else will work, any ideas?
haven't had that problem but if i find myself stuck at console i login and run 'sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart'
i know that, i did not have the chance to use it though....
i actually like doing killall -1 gdm
